parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From para and didomi; to surrender, i.e yield up, intrust, transmit.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To mock, ridicule. From en and paizo; to jeer at, i.e. Deride.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To insult, treat with insolence. From hubris; to exercise violence, i.e. Abuse.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To spit upon. From en and ptuo; to spit at or on.
